Thanks

Mostly porting changes to the original lib were made yes, I'll have=
 to
make sure that everything is correctly isolated for the next release,
a=
s so far I'm only sure it'll compile on win32. The main() is modified
and l=
ost in functionality and the current usage is :
arcdump arcfile
Then you'll=
 get files written to the current directory with name from
1 to N where N i=
s the number of members of the arc file.

I'll put a note in the README for=
 the next release and update the website.

Regis
